summary: ON TWO DIFFERENT OCCASION THE ABS MADE A CLUNKING NOISE.  THE DEALER INSPECTED THE VEHICLE BUT COULD NOT DUPLICATE  OR CORRECT THE PROBLEM.   *NLM   THE BRAKE PROBLEMS HAD COME BACK AGAIN.  THE DEALER FOUND A BRAKE SWITCH FAILURE CODE.  THE DEALER ATTEMPTED TO REPAIR THE PROBLEM BUT IT REMAINED THE SAME.   *SCC
